welcome_message_body: Welcome to Geneva, where the picturesque lakeside setting and vibrant international community create a unique and charming atmosphere. Known for its rich history, stunning views of the Alps, and world-class dining, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: French Sector Terminal
terminals.description: The French Sector Terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport serves flights to and from France.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The Private Aviation Terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
